oai_dc:dc.dc:descriptions: ≠kágára and !haunu, who fought each other with lightning. By /han≠kass’o (L VIII.-30 8637-8648).
See|han≠kass'o's grandmothers used to tell him that ≠kagara was fighting with !haunu in the east when the weather thundered and when the clouds resembled mountains and were thick.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ≠kagara's fight with !haunu in the east
